title: I cant see how long my friends have been playing for
body:
I cant see how long my friends have been playing for.
halp plz, I have windows 10 idk how to fix it

replies.body:
Hey there,

I don't think I understand what you mean? are you talking about the on-hover popup in your friends list that displays how long player X has been in-game?

When I hover over my friends name, it says "Summoners Rift (Normal) - Gnar      - - : - -
If it showed the time wouldn't it be Summoners Rift (Normal) - Gnar      -36 : 52 or something like that?
Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me and let me know if that resolves the issue.
